cash_addr¶

util.cash_addr.assemble(prefix, data)¶

Compute a cashaddr string given prefix and data values.

util.cash_addr.create_checksum(prefix, data)¶

Compute the checksum values given prefix and data.

util.cash_addr.decode(prefix, addr)¶

Decode a cashaddr address.

util.cash_addr.disassemble(cashaddr, default_prefix)¶

Validate a cashaddr string, and determine prefix and data.

util.cash_addr.encode(prefix, ver, data)¶

Encode a cashaddr address.

util.cash_addr.expand_prefix(prefix)¶

Expand the address prefix into values for checksum computation.

util.cash_addr.polymod(values)¶

Internal function that computes the cashaddr checksum.

util.cash_addr.valid_version(data)¶

Check that the version is correct for the data. Do not include the checksum.

util.cash_addr.verify_checksum(prefix, data)¶

Verify a checksum given prefix and converted data characters.
